title: Which prestigious universities offer an MBA online? - Quora
tags: Colleges and Universities for Master of Business Administration

response.answer_text: That’s a bit difficult question to be answered. This is because almost every prestigious university offers an MBA online these days. Right from top universities across the globe to smaller universities in your region offer an online MBA. So what makes the difference? Which is the best university to choose among a pool of universities? Here are the key factors that you are to check before choosing the best among the best. They are the syllabus they offer, how flexible the course timings and durations are, is the fees affordable and top of all whether or not the university is accredited by world-level organizational bodies. The above are the features that you have to examine before getting yourself admitted for an online MBA. If the university is not accredited by organizational bodies, your MBA certificate is worthless.Hence it is important for you to look for this. I am stressing this again, in order to let you know the importance of the same. I recently came across Texila’s online MBA. The reviews are good. Have a check.
The ones ranked by the FT: http://rankings.ft.com/businessschoolrankings/online-mba-ranking-2017 plus the University of Illinois and the University of London.
